job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for an ambitious and skilled Senior Go Engineer to play a key role in the development and delivery of our software products and apps serving over 4m+ users across the globe., As a member of our tech team in Amsterdam, and together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers, you will contribute to the development of innovative solutions that cater to the requirements of our expanding user community. This empowers users to maximize the benefits derived from our products and services. Additionally, you will have the responsibility of designing and implementing systems that interact with our continuously evolving AI-powered platform, ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure.
     * Write production-grade product and platform code.
     * Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.
     * Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code.
     * Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture.

   Projects you can look forward to:
     * CF Spark. Our very own Generative AI tool for which customers have already generated over 40+ million images in the last couple of months
     * Launch our Mobile Apps for both iOS and Android platforms.
     * Develop our Community Tools. Kicking this off with our very own AI Chatbot.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Go Engineer

We are looking for an ambitious and skilled Senior Go Engineer to play a key role in the development and delivery of our software products and apps serving over 4m+ users across the globe., As a member of our tech team in Amsterdam, and together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers, you will contribute to the development of innovative solutions that cater to the requirements of our expanding user community. This empowers users to maximize the benefits derived from our products and services. Additionally, you will have the responsibility of designing and implementing systems that interact with our continuously evolving AI-powered platform, ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure.
     * Write production-grade product and platform code.
     * Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.
     * Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code.
     * Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture.

   Projects you can look forward to:
     * CF Spark. Our very own Generative AI tool for which customers have already generated over 40+ million images in the last couple of months
     * Launch our Mobile Apps for both iOS and Android platforms.
     * Develop our Community Tools. Kicking this off with our very own AI Chatbot.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software engineering (Go, mobile apps, community tools, platform code) and mentions interaction with an AI-powered platform and a Generative AI tool (CF Spark) as a project. However, it does not detail core responsibilities or required skills related to developing, fine-tuning, or deploying generative models themselves. The primary focus is on building and scaling software that *uses* or *interacts with* AI, rather than the AI development itself, fitting the criteria for 'Ambiguous' as it's not a core AI engineering role.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes 'development and delivery of our software products and apps', 'contribute to the development of innovative solutions', 'designing and implementing systems', 'Write production-grade product and platform code', 'Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code', and mentions launching 'Mobile Apps for both iOS and Android platforms'. These are all core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: development and delivery of our software products and apps

job_tasks.justification: The role involves designing and implementing systems, which is a fundamental software engineering task, especially when ensuring scalability, reliability, and security.
job_tasks.phrase: designing and implementing systems that interact with our continuously evolving AI-powered platform

job_tasks.justification: Writing 'production-grade product and platform code' is a direct indicator of software development responsibilities.
job_tasks.phrase: Write production-grade product and platform code

job_tasks.justification: Taking responsibility for technical designs and delivering quality code are key aspects of software engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code

job_tasks.justification: Launching mobile apps is a specific software development project.
job_tasks.phrase: Launch our Mobile Apps for both iOS and Android platforms

job_tasks.justification: Developing community tools, specifically an AI Chatbot, involves software development to build the interface and functionality.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop our Community Tools. Kicking this off with our very own AI Chatbot.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'cater to the requirements of our expanding user community' and 'empowers users to maximize the benefits derived from our products and services' indicates a need to understand user needs and business objectives.
job_tasks.phrase: cater to the requirements of our expanding user community

job_tasks.justification: Ensuring that what is delivered is 'scalable, reliable, and secure' points to operational concerns in deploying and maintaining software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure

job_tasks.justification: The mention of working 'together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers' highlights the need for collaboration.
job_tasks.phrase: together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers

job_tasks.justification: Promoting a 'feedback and knowledge sharing culture' is a clear indicator of soft skills related to communication and collaboration.
job_tasks.phrase: Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture

job_tasks.justification: The mention of a 'continuously evolving AI-powered platform' suggests a need to adapt to new technologies and changes in the AI space.
The emphasis on an 'agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions' points towards a pragmatic and iterative approach to problem-solving.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'CF Spark. Our very own Generative AI tool' and 'AI Chatbot' indicates interaction with generative AI technologies, though the role is not explicitly about building these models from scratch.
job_tasks.phrase: CF Spark. Our very own Generative AI tool

job_tasks.justification: The mention of an 'AI Chatbot' as a project indicates involvement with generative AI applications.

soft_skills.phrase: together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers
Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture
Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.
Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code
